sentences.en: "Well done, Cassandra," Crook said. She blushed, but accepted the compliment with good grace.
sentences.cn: “干得好，卡桑德拉。”克鲁克说。她脸一下子红了，但还是很有风度地接受了恭维。

sentences.en: After Proxmire great compliment, I smiled for a moment.
sentences.cn: 在普罗克斯迈尔说了这一大套恭维的话以后, 我微笑了一会儿.

sentences.en: all drinks will be supplied with our compliments.
sentences.cn: 所有饮料将由我们免费供应。

sentences.en: All the guests paid her extravagant compliments.
sentences.cn: 所有客人都对她赞不绝口。

sentences.en: Being compared to Abba is a great compliment.
sentences.cn: 能和阿巴乐队相提并论是极大的赞誉。

sentences.en: Compliments of the season! (= for Christmas or the New Year)
sentences.cn: 谨致节日的祝贺！（圣诞节或新年时的贺词）

sentences.en: Even the doctor, shy but no fool, half unconsciously acknowledged the compliment.
sentences.cn: 甚至医生本人, 虽然有些腼腆,却并不愚蠢, 也有一星半点儿意识到这种礼遇.

sentences.en: Firstly I compliment you on most of your excellent Spring issue of "Triangle".
sentences.cn: 首先,让我来夸几句,你们《三角迷踪》春季号的大部分内容都非常精彩.

sentences.en: He addressed her with high compliment.
sentences.cn: 他以非常恭维的话向她献殷勤.

sentences.en: He attempted a compliment on her truly exceptional character.
sentences.cn: 他有心赞扬她确确实实与众不同的性格.

sentences.en: I was embarrassed by their compliment.
sentences.cn: 对他们的称赞我感到很不安.

sentences.en: It mustn't sound like a contrived compliment.
sentences.cn: 它听起来不能像是虚情假意的恭维。

sentences.en: It's obvious he's worried about us and I'm taking it as a compliment.
sentences.cn: 显然他担心我们，我把这当做一种赞美。

sentences.en: Laura acknowledged this compliment with a negligent wave of her left hand.
sentences.cn: 劳拉随意挥了挥左手算是听到了这个赞扬。

sentences.en: Please accept these tickets with our compliments.
sentences.cn: 赠票若干，敬请笑纳。

sentences.en: Saying she's improved comes over as a backhanded compliment.
sentences.cn: 说她进步了听起来倒像是一种讽刺。

sentences.en: She complimented him on his excellent German.
sentences.cn: 她夸奖他德语棒极了。

sentences.en: The actors have en-tertained us so splendidly during this weekend, I think it's time we returned the compliment.
sentences.cn: 这周末演员们给我们带来了精彩的演出，我觉得我们该回请他们了。

sentences.en: The groom was so nervous he forgot to compliment the bridesmaids.
sentences.cn: 新郎太紧张了，都忘了夸奖伴娘。

sentences.en: The manager paid her a compliment on her work.
sentences.cn: 经理赞扬了她的工作.

sentences.en: We consider it a compliment to be called "conservative"
sentences.cn: 我们认为被称作“保守分子”是对我们的一种赞赏。

sentences.en: With the compliments of J. Smith & Son. J.
sentences.cn: 史密斯父子公司敬赠。

sentences.en: Your presence is a great compliment.
sentences.cn: 承蒙光临,不胜荣幸.

phrases.tran_cn: 谨致节日的祝贺（用作圣诞、新年时的贺词）
言不由衷(或挖苦人)的恭维话
回应别人的问候；回敬别人的称赞

phrases.phrase: with someone's compliments (或 the compliments of)
phrases.tran_cn: …敬赠，免费赠送（用于表示所给之物系赠品）

trans.tran_en: a remark that shows you admire someone or something
a remark that shows you admire someone or something
to say something nice to someone in order to praise them
to say something nice to someone in order to praise them
